metadata.title: CVE-2020-15522 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Bouncy Castle BC Java before 1.66, BC C# .NET before 1.8.7, BC-FJA before1.0.1.2, 1.0.2.1, and BC-FNA before 1.0.1.1 have a timing issue within theEC math library that can expose information about the private key when anattacker is able to observe timing information for the generation ofmultiple deterministic ECDSA signatures.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
